97  	private static void integrationTests(final TestSuite suite) throws Exception
98  	{
99  		suite.addTestSuite(net.sf.oval.test.integration.spring.SpringAOPAllianceTest.class);
100 		suite.addTestSuite(net.sf.oval.test.integration.spring.SpringValidatorTest.class);
101 	}
102 
103 	public static Test suite() throws Exception
104 	{
105 		System.setSecurityManager(new SecurityManager());
106 
107 		// $JUnit-BEGIN$
108 		final TestSuite suite = new TestSuite("Test for net.sf.oval");
109 
110 		// Tests with JDK collections
111 		{
112 			final TestSuite suite1 = new TestSuite("Tests for net.sf.oval with JDK collections");
113 			constraintsTests(suite1);
114 			validatorTests(suite1);
115 			guardTests(suite1);
116 			integrationTests(suite1);
117 			final TestSetup setup1 = new TestSetup(suite1)
118 				{
119 					@Override
120 					protected void setUp() throws Exception
121 					{
122 						super.setUp();
123 						Validator.setCollectionFactory(new CollectionFactoryJDKImpl());
124 					}
125 				};
126 			suite.addTest(setup1);
127 		}
128 
129 		// Tests with Javolution collections
130 		{
131 			final TestSuite suite1 = new TestSuite("Tests for net.sf.oval with Javolution collections");
132 			constraintsTests(suite1);
133 			validatorTests(suite1);
134 			guardTests(suite1);
135 			integrationTests(suite1);
136 			final TestSetup setup1 = new TestSetup(suite1)
137 				{
138 					@Override
139 					protected void setUp() throws Exception
140 					{
141 						super.setUp();
142 						Validator.setCollectionFactory(new CollectionFactoryJavalutionImpl());
143 					}
144 				};
145 			suite.addTest(setup1);
146 		}
147 
148 		// Tests with Trove collections
149 		{
150 			final TestSuite suite1 = new TestSuite("Tests for net.sf.oval with Trove collections");
151 			constraintsTests(suite1);
152 			validatorTests(suite1);
153 			guardTests(suite1);
154 			integrationTests(suite1);
155 			final TestSetup setup1 = new TestSetup(suite1)
156 				{
157 					@Override
158 					protected void setUp() throws Exception
159 					{
160 						super.setUp();
161 						Validator.setCollectionFactory(new CollectionFactoryTroveImpl());
162 					}
163 				};
164 			suite.addTest(setup1);
165 		}
166 		// $JUnit-END$
167 		return suite;
168 	}
169
